I feel like expressing my feelings right here. I do wish someone would come in to take charge of the Review and Herald and let you go free. I believe you could do great good in the field--now, at this very time, in giving your clear and powerful discourse on United States in Prophecy. I wish your entire 


                                     -78- 

family were located here in California. Can you not work to that point, that not another severe winter like the present shall be spent in the east?
